titles.title: Military Thrift Savings Plan Implementation Act
To provide for the implementation of the provisions of law allowing members of the uniformed services to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/2/2000--Introduced. Military Thrift Savings Plan Implementation Act - Provides for the implementation of certain provisions of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2000 for purposes of allowing military personnel to participate in the Federal Thrift Savings Plan.
